title: Osher Gunsberg shuts down the idea of having more children
text:
He welcomed his first child, son Wolfgang 'Wolfie' Günsberg, in August.

And on Tuesday, Osher Günsberg shut down the idea of having more children, just two months after his wife Audrey Griffen gave birth to their son.

Speaking to Now To Love, the 45-year-old TV presenter hinted her may be getting a vasectomy, saying: 'I will be in the butcher in December and the shop is getting closed.'

'The shop is getting closed!' Osher Gunsberg (pictured) has shut down the idea of having any more children

'It's not a competition to see who can have more babies,' he added.

Osher, who has previously opened up his mental health struggles, also revealed he went back onto his medication several weeks before his son was born.

He explained: 'When I got sick about five years ago, I had episodes of psychosis that manifested into paranoid delusions.'

'I could see that a lot of those things were happening again but I didn't want to admit it.'

New arrival: 0sher claimed that the 'shop is getting closed' and 'it shouldn't be a competition to see who can have more babies' (pictured Osher and wife Audrey with son Wolfie)

In August, Osher announced he had welcomed his son via Instagram, sharing a photo of himself and his wife with their newborn.

'He and @Audreygriffen did so well on Friday when he was born perfectly formed with ten fingers and toes, healthy and happy at 3.97kg,' he wrote.

'Though between the delivery bed and the scale he did do a massive poop - and the doc agreed that if he hadn't he would have topped 4kg easily.'

Proud dad: In August, Osher welcomed his first child, son Wolfgang 'Wolfie' Günsberg, with his wife Audrey Griffen (pictured is Osher and Wolfie)

Osher went on to pay tribute to Audrey, writing: 'I am in complete awe of my wife. What I witnessed her do, the power I saw her summon from within her to bring this boy into the world was utterly astonishing. ⁠

'As he came closer and closer, her body began to unleash an incredible energy that was absolutely not going to be held back. ⁠

'That I've known Audrey for over five years, and yet had no idea that within her this whole time was an almighty divine force capable of bringing life into the world like this blows my mind and was astonishing to witness.' ⁠

Osher is also a stepfather to Georgia, 15, from Audrey's previous relationship.
description: He welcomed his first child, son Wolfgang 'Wolfie' Günsberg, in August.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
